treks.title: Annapurna Circuit Trek
treks.short_description: The world-famous trek circling Mt. Annapurna through diverse landscapes - tropical forests, rhododendron forests, high passes, and Himalayan villages with panoramic mountain vistas and cultural immersion.
treks.review_text: The most iconic trek in Nepal - complete circuit around Annapurna massif with diverse terrain, cultures, and ultimate high mountain experience.

hero_section.title: Annapurna Circuit Trek
hero_section.subtitle: Complete circuit around Annapurna massif - World's most famous trek

sections.heading: Annapurna Circuit Trek Overview
articles: The Annapurna Circuit is the world's most famous trekking route, circumnavigating the Annapurna Massif (8,091m). This 21-day challenging trek takes you through diverse ecosystems - from subtropical forests at 823m to the high Thorung La Pass at 5,416m. The circuit passes through authentic Gurung and Magar villages, ancient Buddhist monasteries, and pristine wilderness. You'll experience dramatic elevation changes, encounter local cultures, and witness stunning panoramic views of Annapurna I, II, III, IV, Dhaulagiri, Manaslu, and Machhapuchhare. The trek crosses three high passes (Thorung La being the highest) and includes stays in traditional teahouses throughout.

bullets.text: Max altitude 5,416m (Thorung La Pass) - highest point
Diverse landscapes - tropical to alpine ecosystems

itinerary_days.title: Arrive Kathmandu
itinerary_days.description: Arrival in Kathmandu. Meet guide, prepare trekking equipment, acclimatization and cultural briefing.

itinerary_days.title: Drive Kathmandu to Besisahar
itinerary_days.description: Drive 120 km east along Marsyangdi River to Besisahar - gateway to Annapurna Circuit.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Besisahar to Bhulbhule
itinerary_days.description: Trek through agricultural lands and subtropical forests alongside Marsyangdi River valley.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Bhulbhule to Bahundanda
itinerary_days.description: Trek through rhododendron forests and villages. Gradual ascent with river valley views.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Bahundanda to Chame
itinerary_days.description: Trek through pine and oak forests. Enter restricted Annapurna Conservation Area. Marsyangdi River constantly in view.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Chame to Pisang
itinerary_days.description: Ascend to high altitude. First mountain views. Everest and other peaks become visible on clear days.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Pisang to Manang
itinerary_days.description: Trek to Manang village. High altitude acclimatization day at 3,540m. Explore ancient Tibetan monastery and village.

itinerary_days.title: Acclimatization Day in Manang
itinerary_days.description: Rest day for acclimatization. Explore Manang village, Buddhist monastery, and surrounding high altitude landscapes.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Manang to Tanki Bhawan
itinerary_days.description: Ascend to higher altitude. Trek through sparse alpine vegetation with panoramic Himalayan views.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Tanki Bhawan to Thorung High Camp
itinerary_days.description: Steep ascent to high camp at 4,570m. Prepare for Thorung La Pass crossing next day.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Thorung High Camp to Thorung La to Muktinath
itinerary_days.description: Early morning crossing of Thorung La Pass (5,416m) - trek's most challenging section. Panoramic 360-degree views. Descend to sacred Muktinath Temple.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Muktinath to Jomsom
itinerary_days.description: Descend to Jomsom. Trek through arid desert landscape unique to Lower Mustang.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Jomsom to Ghasa
itinerary_days.description: Trek along Kali Gandaki River gorge. Visit apple orchards and continue south.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Ghasa to Tatopani
itinerary_days.description: Trek through forests alongside Kali Gandaki River. Visit hot spring at Tatopani village.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Tatopani to Ghorepani
itinerary_days.description: Steep ascent through rhododendron and oak forests to Ghorepani village. Poon Hill viewpoint nearby.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Ghorepani to Poon Hill to Ulleri
itinerary_days.description: Early morning hike to Poon Hill (3,210m) for sunrise over Annapurna and Dhaulagiri. Descend to Ulleri village.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Ulleri to Birethanti
itinerary_days.description: Descent through villages and forests to Birethanti village in Pokhara foothills.

itinerary_days.title: Trek Birethanti to Pokhara
itinerary_days.description: Final trek to Pokhara. Drive from Birethanti to Pokhara city.

itinerary_days.title: Drive Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary_days.description: Drive 200 km back to Kathmandu. Rest and celebration dinner.

itinerary_days.title: Rest Day in Kathmandu
itinerary_days.description: Rest in Kathmandu. Optional cultural tour or shopping.

itinerary_days.title: Departure
itinerary_days.description: Transfer to airport for departure. Trek completion ceremony.

highlights.title: Thorung La Pass - Iconic High Pass Crossing
highlights.description: Cross the famous Thorung La Pass at 5,416m with 360-degree panoramic Himalayan views. This is the trek's most challenging and rewarding section.

highlights.title: Complete Circuit Around Annapurna
highlights.description: Circle the entire Annapurna Massif (8,091m) experiencing diverse ecosystems and cultures - truly the world's greatest trek.

highlights.title: Poon Hill Sunrise View
highlights.description: Witness breathtaking sunrise over Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, and Machapuchare from Poon Hill (3,210m). Unforgettable mountain photography opportunity.

highlights.title: Diverse Landscapes & Cultures
highlights.description: Trek through tropical forests, rhododendron forests, alpine zones, and desert landscapes. Meet Gurung, Magar, and Tibetan communities with unique traditions.

cost.title: Cost Includes / Excludes
cost_inclusions: All meals during trek (breakfast, lunch, dinner)

cost_and_date_section.intro_text: Annapurna Circuit is best March-May (Spring) and September-November (Autumn). All prices per person vary by group size. Private departures available on request.

date_highlights.highlight: Spring (March-May): Clear mountain views, rhododendron blooms
Autumn (Sept-Nov): Stable weather, crystal-clear visibility, peak season

questions.question: Is Annapurna Circuit suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Annapurna Circuit is challenging. Previous trekking experience and good fitness essential. The Thorung La Pass crossing at 5,416m is demanding.

questions.question: What altitude experience required?
questions.answer: Minimum EBC trek or equivalent. The high altitude and pass crossing require excellent acclimatization skills.

gallery_images.title: Thorung La Pass
gallery_images.caption: Famous pass at 5,416m with panoramic views

elevation_chart.title: Elevation Profile
elevation_chart.subtitle: 21-day complete circuit with high pass crossing

additional_info_sections.heading: Important Information
articles: Annapurna Circuit is physically demanding with high altitude exposure. Proper acclimatization and slow pace are essential.
Thorung La Pass is sometimes blocked by snow in winter. Spring and autumn are recommended seasons.
Travel insurance with altitude coverage is mandatory.
